org.mule.modules.openidconnect.config

Class MetaDataBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.openidconnect.config.MetaDataBuilder

  • public class MetaDataBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible to build and provide meta data of an OpenID Connect Identity-Provider. The data is provided manually with the parameters of the ConnectorConfig or through HTTP from IdP. To obtain the configuration from IdP the specified OpenID Configuration discovery is used.
    Author:
    Moritz MÃ¶ller, AOE GmbH
    See Also:
    OpenID Connect spec

      com.nimbusds.openid.connect.sdk.op.OIDCProviderMetadata provideMetadataFromServer(java.lang.String configurationEndpoint)
      Obtains the IdP configuration as JSON String via requestJsonString() to build and return the IdP-metadata
      com.nimbusds.openid.connect.sdk.op.OIDCProviderMetadata provideMetadataManually(java.lang.String authEndpoint, java.lang.String tokenEndpoint, java.lang.String jwkSetEndpoint)
      Builds and returns the IdP-metadata manually from parameters passed to it.
      java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey providePublicKeyFromJwkSet(com.nimbusds.openid.connect.sdk.op.OIDCProviderMetadata providerMetadata)
      Parses a JSON string obtained from requestJsonString() to obtain the JSON Web Key configuration from the IdP and returns the RSAPublicKey

      • provideMetadataFromServer

        public com.nimbusds.openid.connect.sdk.op.OIDCProviderMetadata provideMetadataFromServer(java.lang.String configurationEndpoint)
                                                                                  throws com.nimbusds.oauth2.sdk.ParseException
        Obtains the IdP configuration as JSON String via requestJsonString() to build and return the IdP-metadata
        Parameters:
        configurationEndpoint - Endpoint at the IdP to obtain configuration data
        Returns:
        the IdP-metadata
        Throws:
        com.nimbusds.oauth2.sdk.ParseException - Thrown if the JSON from the response can not be parsed

                                                                                       java.lang.String jwkSetEndpoint)
        Builds and returns the IdP-metadata manually from parameters passed to it.
        Parameters:

        tokenEndpoint - Token endpoint
        jwkSetEndpoint - JSON Web Key endpoint
        Returns:
        the IdP-metadata
